item.title: SLIP-P - Shamir DEK Visualization on Plates TineySeed / OneKey KeyTag - style
item.description: SLIP-P is a small, open-source demo that helps you split a data-encryption-key (DEK) using Shamir secret sharing and render the resulting shares as human-friendly plates (OneKey/Tinyseed-style). It is intended as a practical exploration and visual aid for securely storing key shares offline. Why this is useful If you want to split a master key into multiple physical copies (plates) such that any threshold of them can recover the key, SLIP-P shows a simple way to do it and to verify shares with a short checksum.

item.title: How I Generate Custom OpenGraph Images During Rails Deploys With Python and Ansible
item.description: Most Rails apps do not bother with a custom OpenGraph image. Mine do and they are generated automatically during deployment using Python, Cairo and Ansible.
